title: Dad Bods, Truth Be Told, Right or Wrong, Self Care Tips and more.
itunes:title: Dad Bods, Truth Be Told, Right or Wrong, Self Care Tips and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve is putting out government names. Big ups to all of our affiliates for making us who we are today!!! There is a study that concludes dad bods could be preferred by women over six pack abs. Unattractive people are the subject of Truth Be Told. The Chief Love Officer breaks down the reality of looking for love and more. Fool #1 battles Junior in Right or Wrong. We have the things people say when they don't want to curse. Steve gives us some self care tips that includes cussing. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks to us about accepting God's will, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
